full_text:
Page 1891
Fwd: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
From: Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To: Lamine N'Diaye
Date: 2019/07/28 09:03
Subject: Fwd: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [redacted]@bop.gov>
Date: 7/28/19 8:58 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted]@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>>> [redacted] 7/28/2019 08:58 >>>
Thanks:
I'll let the Lt.s' know to move him.
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [redacted]@bop.gov 7/28/2019 8:56 AM >>>
Can you not just move him to another cell? He will not have lunch in Attorney Conference. He will go back to his cell to eat. He knows this.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [redacted]@bop.gov>
Date: 7/28/19 8:52 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted]@bop.gov>
Cc: [redacted]@bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>>> [redacted] 7/28/2019 08:52 >>>
He also complained that he is in Attorney Conference from about 8 AM to about 8 PM each day and he said yesterday he only received one meal, a sand also additional information on the toilet that reportedly flushed for 45 minutes. He stated to avoid the toilet from doing that again because he stated he fi
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott [redacted]@bop.gov 7/28/2019 7:51 AM >>>
Good morning,
Thank you.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [redacted]@bop.gov>
Date: 7/28/19 7:49 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted]@bop.gov>
Cc: [redacted]@bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
>>> [redacted] 07/28/2019 07:49 >>>
AW Skipper-Scott,
Inmate Epstein seems psychologically stable.
He complained that his right arm was numb and hanging earlier. Nurse [redacted] saw him.
He again said his right arm still feels somewhat numb and he said he cannot make a fist with that hand. He also said he has numbness on his neck. I infor
He stated the toilet in his cell was running for 45 minutes last night and he could not take the noise. He is going to try the toilet before going to legal toda;
Thank
Page 10244
DOJ-OGR-00025874

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the status of Inmate Epstein, including his psychological state, complaints about his treatment, and issues with his cell. The emails are heavily redacted, with names and email addresses removed. The document appears to be a official communication within the Department of Justice.
